titles.title: A bill amending the Harmonized Tariff Schedule.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16768)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on N-(1,1-dimethylethyl- 3-oxo-4-aza-5-alpha-androst-1-ene-17-beta-carboxamide (finasteride and finasteride tablets).
